name: Here's Your Change! (feralpoodles)
description:
Sort coins to add up to the correct amounts!

  • Click on platforms to switch their direction
  • Going over the amount shown gives you a strike; 3 strikes and you lose
  • Gold is worth .25, Silver is worth .10, Nickel is worth .05, Copper is worth .01
  • Use the escape key to pause the game

This is my first game made with Unity, I hope you enjoy it! Make sure to comment your high score! :)
